v1.headline: Senior Android Developer | Kotlin & Jetpack Compose Expert | 5+ years | TDD, KMP, Remote-ready.
v1.about:
I'm a passionate Senior Android Developer with over 5 years of commercial experience building robust and scalable apps using Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and Clean Architecture. I focus on test-driven development (TDD), maintainable code, and high-quality UI/UX using modern Android tools.

My stack includes:
- Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Coroutines, Flow
- Dependency Injection: Dagger 2, Hilt
- KMP (Kotlin Multiplatform) for shared logic
- CI/CD with GitHub Actions, Gradle
- MVVM, MVI

I actively contribute to open-source, write developer utilities, and enjoy working in product-driven remote teams. Currently open to new opportunities to build impactful mobile products with smart and motivated teams.
